duties_responsibilities.duty: Review cases for accuracy of tissue request and escalate when needed. Complete accurate data entry and assist in resolving issues with cases.
Ensure necessary notes and holds are placed on cases for non-conforming samples, discrepancies, and/or missing information for timely follow-up.
Compose professional communications with other departments for case escalation and updates.
Perform outbound calls to pathology labs for specimen information and attend interdepartmental meetings if needed.
Monitor errors and metrics for all tissue cases and handle most escalations, discrepancies, and holds.
Work with PHI on a regular basis, complete HIPAA/PHI privacy training, and maintain a current status on Natera training requirements.
Perform other assigned duties as needed.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma, 2+ years of medical industry related experience, and previous computer and data entry experience required.
